actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Insurance.
House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Senate Committee on Banking discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
House Disagreed to Senate Amendments by Unanimous Consent.
Message on House action received in Senate and held at desk:. House disagrees to Senate amendments.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to extend until February 1, 1988, the emergency acquisition and net worth guarantee provisions of the Garn-St Germain Depository Institutions Act of 1982.

summary.text: (House disagreed to Senate amendments) Amends the Garn-St Germain Depository Institutions Act of 1982 to extend the Deposit Insurance Flexibility Act and the Net Worth Certificate Act until September 15, 1987.

titles.title: A bill to extend until February 1, 1988, the emergency acquisition and net worth guarantee provisions of the Garn-St Germain Depository Institutions Act of 1982.
